title.narrative: HEALTH & Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH)

description.narrative: Countries and country offices in South Asia supported in progress towards achievement of health related MDGs with equity., which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Regional Support and inter-country initiatives contribute to the quality and impact of policy and programmatic actions for the realization of children's rights in the region in development and humanitarian settings.
